name: Gitea
author: kontakt@kodingwww.ml
description: Gitea is an open-source forge software package for hosting software development version control using Git as well as other collaborative features like bug tracking, wikis and code review. It supports self-hosting but also provides a free public first-party instance

installation.script:
apt update
apt upgrade -y
apt install wget -y

cd /mnt/server

ARCHITECTURE=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "amd64" || echo "arm64")

wget -O gitea https://dl.gitea.io/gitea/main/gitea-main-linux-${ARCHITECTURE} > /dev/null
chmod +x gitea

#Dir for custom ssh port
mkdir custom

echo "[server]
LOCAL_ROOT_URL = http://localhost:${SERVER_PORT}/
DOMAIN           = ${SERVER_IP}
HTTP_PORT        = ${SERVER_PORT}
DISABLE_SSH      = ${DISABLE_SSH}
SSH_PORT         = ${SSH_PORT}" > /mnt/server/custom/app.ini

echo "Thank for install, kry008"
echo "Install complete"
